content:
Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 1 of 30.


Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (28, 25), stationary, HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "敵空母はマップ左上(3,3)近傍にいると推定される。自軍空母はマップ右下(28,25)に位置し、敵空母までの距離は最大で約25ヘクス程度。航空部隊の航続距離は22なので、現状の位置からでは敵空母に到達できない可能性が高い。まずは空母を北西方向へ移動し、航空部隊の索敵範囲を広げる。敵空母の初期位置を考慮し、最短で接近しつつも陸地を避けるルートを選択する。次ターン以降、航空部隊を発艦し索敵を開始する。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 26, "y": 23}, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 2 of 30.


Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (27, 23), en route to target (26, 23), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "空母は順調に北西へ移動中。敵空母の初期位置(3,3)までの距離はまだ遠いが、次ターン以降の索敵展開を考慮し、さらに北西へ進める。現時点では航空部隊の発艦はまだ早い。敵空母の推定位置に近づきつつ、陸地を避けて進む。次ターン以降、索敵範囲が敵空母に届く位置で航空部隊を発艦予定。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 25, "y": 21}, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 3 of 30.


Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (26, 22), en route to target (25, 21), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "空母は順調に北西方向へ進行中。現在位置(26,22)から敵空母推定初期位置(3,3)までの直線距離は約23ヘクスで、航空部隊の航続距離22にほぼ届く範囲。次ターンにはさらに接近し、航空部隊の索敵範囲が敵空母に十分届くようになる。現時点ではまだ発艦せず、もう1ターン空母を前進させてから、広範囲に索敵できるように航空部隊を発艦する計画。陸地を避けつつ、敵空母の逃走経路も考慮して進む。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 24, "y": 19}, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 4 of 30.


Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (25, 20), en route to target (24, 19), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "空母は(25,20)まで前進し、敵空母推定初期位置(3,3)までの直線距離は約22ヘクスとなり、航空部隊の航続距離内に敵空母が入った。ここで航空部隊を発艦し、広範囲に索敵を開始する。1機は敵空母初期位置(3,3)を直接狙い、もう1機はやや南西寄り(7,7)を狙って敵空母の移動も考慮した索敵を行う。空母自身もさらに北西へ前進し、次ターン以降の索敵範囲を拡大する。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 23, "y": 17}, "launch_target": {"x": 3, "y": 3}}}

ERROR: invalid your order, rejected: launch_target was rejected. x=3 y=3 is out of squadron range. Please specify a valid coordinate, such as x=9 y=7.
Please fix your order.

{"thinking": "空母(25,20)から敵空母初期位置(3,3)は航続距離22をわずかに超えているため、直接狙うことはできない。最遠到達可能な範囲で、敵空母の初期位置に近い海域を索敵する必要がある。まず1機は到達可能な最遠点(9,7)を指定し、もう1機はやや南寄り(11,9)を指定して索敵範囲を広げる。空母自身もさらに北西へ前進し、次ターン以降さらに索敵範囲を拡大する。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 23, "y": 17}, "launch_target": {"x": 9, "y": 7}}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 5 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ1) set a new target toward position (9, 7) while at (23, 17).

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (24, 18), en route to target (23, 17), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (23, 17), outbound toward (9, 7), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "BSQ1は(9,7)へ向けて発艦済み。敵空母の初期位置やその周辺を索敵できる位置であり、敵発見の可能性が高い。BSQ2も索敵範囲を広げるため、やや異なる方向(例えば(11,9))へ発艦させる。空母は引き続き北西へ進め、次ターン以降さらに索敵範囲を拡大する。敵空母の動向が判明すれば、即座に攻撃へ移行できる体制を維持する。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 22, "y": 15}, "launch_target": {"x": 11, "y": 9}}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 6 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ2) set a new target toward position (11, 9) while at (22, 16).

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (23, 16), en route to target (22, 15), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (21, 14), outbound toward (9, 7), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (22, 16), outbound toward (11, 9), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "両航空部隊が敵空母推定初期位置周辺へ向けて索敵中。敵空母が初期位置付近に留まっていれば、次ターン以降で発見できる可能性が高い。空母は引き続き北西へ進め、航空部隊の帰還時に回収しやすい位置を目指す。敵空母が移動している場合、航空部隊の索敵範囲から得られる情報で位置を推定し、次の攻撃や索敵計画を立てる。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 21, "y": 13}, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 7 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (16, 15) while at (18, 12).
- your squadron(BSQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (16, 15) while at (19, 14).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier position unknown.
- Enemy squadron ASQ1: last known position (16, 15) (previously at (15, 14)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (22, 14), en route to target (21, 13), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (18, 12), outbound toward (9, 7), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (19, 14), outbound toward (11, 9), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "両航空部隊が敵航空部隊ASQ1を(16,15)で発見。ASQ1は(15,14)から(16,15)へ移動しており、敵空母はこの周辺またはやや北西方向にいる可能性が高い。敵航空部隊の進行方向から、敵空母は(10,10)〜(15,15)付近にいると推定される。自軍空母はさらに北西へ進め、航空部隊の帰還や次の攻撃に備える。次ターン、敵空母の推定位置(13,13)付近への攻撃・索敵を計画する。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 20, "y": 11}, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 8 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (14, 11) while at (15, 10).
- your squadron(BSQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (14, 11) while at (16, 12).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier position unknown.
- Enemy squadron ASQ1: last known position (14, 11) (previously at (15, 14)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (21, 12), en route to target (20, 11), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (15, 10), outbound toward (9, 7), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (16, 12), outbound toward (11, 9), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "敵航空部隊ASQ1が(14,11)に移動していることから、敵空母はこの周辺、特に(10,10)〜(14,11)付近にいる可能性が高い。敵航空部隊の進行方向から、敵空母はさらに西または北西にいるかもしれない。自軍航空部隊は索敵目標に近づいており、次ターンで帰還に移る可能性がある。空母はさらに北西へ進め、航空部隊の回収と次の発艦準備を進める。敵空母の推定位置を絞り込み、次の攻撃波の発艦位置を検討する。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 19, "y": 9}, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 9 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (15, 7) while at (11, 9).
- your squadron(BSQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (15, 7) while at (13, 10).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier position unknown.
- Enemy squadron ASQ1: last known position (15, 7) (previously at (15, 14)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (20, 10), en route to target (19, 9), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (11, 9), outbound toward (9, 7), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (13, 10), outbound toward (11, 9), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "敵航空部隊ASQ1が(15,7)に出現。これは敵空母が(15,7)より北西、もしくは北寄りにいる可能性を示唆している。自軍航空部隊は索敵目標に到達しつつあり、帰還に移るタイミング。空母はさらに北西へ進め、次の発艦時に敵空母の推定位置(例えば(13,5)や(10,7)付近)を狙えるようにする。敵空母の位置が絞れてきたので、次の航空攻撃波で発見・撃破を狙う。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 18, "y": 7}, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 10 of 30.

Recent events:
- your carrier(BC1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (18, 4) while at (19, 8).
- your carrier(BC1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (17, 12) while at (19, 8).
- your squadron(BSQ1) is returning to the carrier while at (9, 7).
- your squadron(BSQ2) is returning to the carrier while at (11, 9).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier position unknown.
- Enemy squadron ASQ1: last known position (18, 4) (previously at (15, 14)), HP 40/40.
- Enemy squadron ASQ2: last known position (17, 12) (previously at (17, 12)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (19, 8), en route to target (18, 7), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (9, 7), returning to the carrier, HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (11, 9), returning to the carrier, HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "敵航空部隊ASQ1が(18,4)、ASQ2が(17,12)に出現。両者の位置関係から、敵空母はこの2機の間、すなわち(17,8)〜(18,8)付近にいる可能性が高い。自軍航空部隊は帰還中なので、空母はさらに北西へ進めて回収を早め、次の発艦時に敵空母推定位置(17,8)付近を狙う。敵空母の位置がかなり絞れてきたので、次の攻撃波で発見・撃破を狙う。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 17, "y": 6}, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 11 of 30.

Recent events:
- your carrier(BC1) spotted an enemy carrier(AC1) at (18, 3) while at (17, 7).
- your carrier(BC1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (18, 8) while at (17, 7).
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (18, 8) while at (13, 7).
- your squadron(BSQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (18, 8) while at (15, 9).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier AC1: last known position (18, 3) (previously at (18, 3)), HP 100/100.
- Enemy squadron ASQ2: last known position (18, 8) (previously at (17, 12)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (17, 7), en route to target (17, 6), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (13, 7), returning to the carrier, HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (15, 9), returning to the carrier, HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "敵空母AC1の位置(18,3)をついに発見。敵空母はまだ北西方向へ大きくは移動していない様子。自軍航空部隊は帰還中だが、次ターンには回収・再武装が可能となる見込み。空母は敵空母に接近しすぎないようやや南西へ移動しつつ、次の航空攻撃波で(18,3)を直接攻撃できる位置を維持する。敵航空部隊ASQ2が(18,8)にいるため、敵の反撃にも警戒しつつ、次ターンで即座に(18,3)への攻撃を実施する準備を整える。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 16, "y": 6}, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 12 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy carrier(AC1) at (17, 3) while at (15, 7).
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (18, 6) while at (15, 7).
- your squadron(BSQ2) spotted an enemy carrier(AC1) at (17, 3) while at (17, 8).
- your squadron(BSQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (18, 6) while at (17, 8).
- your squadron(BSQ1) landed on the carrier while at (16, 7).
- your squadron(BSQ2) landed on the carrier while at (16, 7).
- your carrier(BC1) spotted an enemy carrier(AC1) at (16, 3) while at (16, 7).
- your carrier(BC1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (17, 4) while at (16, 7).

- Enemy carrier AC1: last known position (16, 3) (previously at (18, 3)), HP 100/100.
- Enemy squadron ASQ2: last known position (17, 4) (previously at (17, 12)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (16, 7), en route to target (16, 6), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "敵空母AC1の位置(16,3)を完全に特定。敵空母はまだ大きく移動していない。自軍航空部隊2機とも回収・再武装済みで即発艦可能。敵空母の位置は空母から直線距離4ヘクスと至近距離であり、両航空部隊とも十分攻撃可能。敵航空部隊ASQ2が(17,4)にいるが、空母への直接攻撃は不可なので、今が最大の攻撃チャンス。両部隊とも(16,3)を攻撃目標として発艦し、敵空母撃沈を狙う。空母自身は現位置で待機し、敵空母の動向に即応できる体制を維持する。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": {"x": 16, "y": 3}}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 13 of 30.

Recent events:
- your carrier(BC1) spotted an enemy carrier(AC1) at (16, 3) while at (16, 6).
- your carrier(BC1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (15, 7) while at (16, 6).
- your squadron(BSQ1) set a new target toward position (16, 3) while at (16, 5).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier AC1: last known position (16, 3) (previously at (18, 3)), HP 100/100.
- Enemy squadron ASQ1: last known position (15, 7) (previously at (16, 5)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (16, 6), en route to target (16, 6), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (16, 5), outbound toward (16, 3), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "敵空母AC1は(16,3)で依然として発見されており、BSQ1はすでに攻撃に向かっている。BSQ2も即座に(16,3)へ発艦し、波状攻撃を仕掛ける。敵航空部隊ASQ1が(15,7)にいるが、空母への直接攻撃は不可。自軍空母は現位置で待機し、敵空母の動向や敵航空部隊の帰還に備える。これで敵空母撃沈の確率が大きく高まる。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": {"x": 16, "y": 3}}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 14 of 30.

Recent events:
- your carrier(BC1) initiated an attack on an enemy squadron(ASQ1) while at (16, 6).
- your carrier(BC1) hit an enemy squadron(ASQ1) causing 28 damage while at (16, 6).
- your carrier(BC1) spotted an enemy carrier(AC1) at (15, 2) while at (16, 6).
- your squadron(BSQ1) set a new target toward an enemy carrier(AC1) at (15, 2) while at (15, 3).
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (15, 7) while at (15, 3).
- your squadron(BSQ1) is engaging an enemy carrier(AC1) while at (15, 3).
- your squadron(BSQ2) set a new target toward position (16, 3) while at (16, 5).

- Enemy carrier AC1: last known position (15, 2) (previously at (18, 3)), HP 100/100.
- Enemy squadron ASQ1: last known position (15, 7) (previously at (16, 5)), HP 17/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (16, 6), en route to target (16, 6), HP 72/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (15, 3), engaging an enemy target at (15, 2), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (16, 5), outbound toward (16, 3), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "敵空母AC1は(15,2)に移動し、BSQ1が攻撃を開始。BSQ2もすぐに攻撃範囲に入る。敵航空部隊ASQ1は(15,7)で大きく損耗しており、脅威度が低下。自軍空母は被弾しHPが72に減少したが、現状の位置で敵空母への圧力を維持しつつ、航空部隊による波状攻撃で敵空母撃沈を狙う。空母は現位置で待機し、航空部隊の攻撃結果を見守る。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 15 of 30.

Recent events:

- Your squadron BSQ2: position (15, 1), engaging an enemy target at (15, 2), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "BSQ1が敵空母AC1に21ダメージを与え、BSQ2も現在攻撃中。敵空母のHPは78/100まで減少。BSQ1は帰還中でHPが19/40と損耗しているが、BSQ2は無傷。敵航空部隊ASQ1は(14,3)でHP17/40、ASQ2は(15,7)で健在。自軍空母は現位置で敵空母への圧力を維持しつつ、次の攻撃波に備える。敵空母の位置は把握できているため、BSQ2の攻撃後、両航空部隊を回収・再武装し、再度波状攻撃を仕掛ける。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 16 of 30.

Recent events:
- your carrier(BC1) initiated an attack on an enemy squadron(ASQ2) while at (16, 6).
- your carrier(BC1) hit an enemy squadron(ASQ2) causing 20 damage while at (16, 6).
- your squadron(BSQ2) initiated an attack on an enemy carrier(AC1) while at (15, 1).
- your squadron(BSQ2) hit an enemy carrier(AC1) causing 17 damage while at (15, 1).
- your squadron(BSQ2) is returning to the carrier while at (15, 1).
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy carrier(AC1) at (15, 2) while at (15, 5).
